history.content:
In Fall 2019, DataBears will be launching the Data Science DeCal aimed to bridge the gap between class projects and personal projects. Throughout the semester, students will complete a series of labs, culminating in a final project implementing the skills they have learned. We are looking for a team of dedicated course staff to develop curriculum materials and mentor our students.

We're not looking for people with advanced skills or experience. We do, however, hope that those who join us will be eager and committed. If you are interested in furthering data science education through project-based instruction, we would love to have you on board. You can access our short application at db.berkeley.edu/decal, due on Sat, Apr 27 at 5 PM. We will notify you shortly about your application status on Sat, Apr 27 at 9 PM.
history.subject: Data Science DeCal Staff Application
